column1: Cost per message in INR on the WhatsApp Business Platform, effective July 1, 2025
We charge on a per-message basis on the WhatsApp Business Platform.
Marketing rates apply across Cloud API and Marketing Messages Lite API.
Some markets are mapped to a "Rest of" region or "Other."
In some markets, we have authentication-international rates.
These rates also apply to Groups, effective August 1, 2025.
